title: 如何给不同的组设置不同的重生点？
author: SKTelecom
txt_content:
如题，如何给不同的组设置不同的重生点？
我要设置builder  alpha   beta  三个组的阵营的重生点
但是
/setspawn builder  /setspawn alpha  /setspawn beta不行,只能重生到刚开始的出生点
求助

replies.author: feiyuyu
replies.txt_content:
ess/config
# Set this to highest, if you want to force EssentialsSpawn to handle the respawning.
respawn-listener-priority: highest

/setspawn builder  /setspawn alpha  /setspawn beta

replies.author: SKTelecom
replies.txt_content:
feiyuyu 发表于 2018-3-17 16:49
ess/config
# Set this to highest, if you want to force EssentialsSpawn to handle the respawning.
res ...
啥意思，能够解释一下吗
